key_risks: Competitive Pressure from established players and emerging startups
Customer Concentration Risk due to reliance on a limited number of large enterprise customers
Economic Sensitivity to macroeconomic factors and reduced IT spending
Data Privacy and Security concerns following a recent data breach
Market Valuation Concerns with below-industry benchmarks and recent downgrade
controversies: Data breach in July 2024 raising concerns about data security
Employee concerns about job security and stressful work environment
environmental_issues: Sustainability initiatives to reduce carbon footprint
social_issues: Workplace concerns about job security and stressful work environment
governance_issues: Emphasis on ethical business conduct, anti-corruption, and anti-discrimination policies

sources.snippet: San Francisco-based operations performance management company PagerDuty informed customers on Thursday that its systems were breached earlier this month.
